entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:32 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 09:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: N 25 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
